title: Does my phone support FM radio? If yes, how do I save manually found stations?
answer:
Yes, your phone supports FM radio. 

 When you enter a channel, the channel is automatically saved in the channel list. If you touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110571) or ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110572), the channel you found is not saved. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110573) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110574)
